_xResult.title: Just Enough Opposite Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made black fitted dress with ivory balloon sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
Black and ivory, adorable and regal, structured yet curvy—this made to measure dress is made of opposites that work marvelously together. We are obsessed with the square neck, because how often are dresses made with square necklines anymore? They're glorious! The balloon sleeves add another unique touch. 

 

This custom made dress can be worn in professional settings, but can be made casual— think canvas shoes for casual or made black pumps and delicate jewelry for the evening. The punto milano fabric is double-sided so it's soft on the inside and outside.

Customizations available are:

Necklines: U neck, V Neck, Round Neck

Dress Length: Above Knees, Knee Length, Below Knees
